{"role": "assistant", "content": "# Creating a Poem Document

I see your message! I'll create a poem in a document for you. I've already drafted a nature-themed poem and created an HTML document version. Now I'll review the final document to ensure it meets your needs.

## Reviewing the Final Document

Let me check the HTML document I've created to make sure it displays properly:

<expose-port>
8000
</expose-port>", "tool_calls": null}
